name: Particulars
description: Particulars is a game with a unique combination of arcade-action and puzzle gameplay, set in the mysterious world of subatomic particles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB Graphics Card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space

reviews.review_text: The game play is ok, but I found that there was far too much focus on the story, which isn't that realated to the gameplay. Too much psychology, not enough physics.

So, I was really getting into this game until I became stuck on one level. The game helpfully informed me that I could press escape and skip the level any time I wanted to. So I played a few more times and decided to skip it. Paused the game. Skip button was grayed out. Way to ♥♥♥♥ off the players, devs.
An story about an australian girl and her many problems in life implemented as an educational game about quarks and stuff
